import numpy as np # linear algebra
import pandas as pd # data processing, CSV file I/O (e.g. pd.read_csv)

# Input data files are available in the read-only "../input/" directory
# For example, running this (by clicking run or pressing Shift+Enter) will list all files under the input directory

import os
for dirname, _, filenames in os.walk('/kaggle/input'):
    for filename in filenames:
        print(os.path.join(dirname, filename))

# You can write up to 20GB to the current directory (/kaggle/working/) that gets preserved as output when you create a version using "Save & Run All" 
# You can also write temporary files to /kaggle/temp/, but they won't be saved outside of the current session

import seaborn as sns

source.f7b6e8d1:
for i in dates:
    world_cases.append(confirmed[i].sum())
    total_deaths.append(deaths[i].sum())
    total_recovered.append(recovered[i].sum())
    
    total_active.append(confirmed[i].sum() - deaths[i].sum() - recovered[i].sum())
    mortality_rate.append(deaths[i].sum() / confirmed[i].sum())
    recovery_rate.append(recovered[i].sum() / confirmed[i].sum())
    
    turkey_cases.append(confirmed_df[confirmed_df["Country/Region"] == "Turkey"][i].sum())
    china_cases.append(confirmed_df[confirmed_df['Country/Region']=='China'][i].sum())
    italy_cases.append(confirmed_df[confirmed_df['Country/Region']=='Italy'][i].sum())
    us_cases.append(confirmed_df[confirmed_df['Country/Region']=='US'][i].sum())
    spain_cases.append(confirmed_df[confirmed_df['Country/Region']=='Spain'][i].sum())
    france_cases.append(confirmed_df[confirmed_df['Country/Region']=='France'][i].sum())
    germany_cases.append(confirmed_df[confirmed_df['Country/Region']=='Germany'][i].sum())
    uk_cases.append(confirmed_df[confirmed_df['Country/Region']=='United Kingdom'][i].sum())
    russia_cases.append(confirmed_df[confirmed_df['Country/Region']=='Russia'][i].sum())
    brazil_cases.append(confirmed_df[confirmed_df['Country/Region']=='Brazil'][i].sum())
    india_cases.append(confirmed_df[confirmed_df['Country/Region']=='India'][i].sum())
    
    turkey_deaths.append(deaths_df[deaths_df['Country/Region']=='Turkey'][i].sum())
    china_deaths.append(deaths_df[deaths_df['Country/Region']=='China'][i].sum())
    italy_deaths.append(deaths_df[deaths_df['Country/Region']=='Italy'][i].sum())
    us_deaths.append(deaths_df[deaths_df['Country/Region']=='US'][i].sum())
    spain_deaths.append(deaths_df[deaths_df['Country/Region']=='Spain'][i].sum())
    france_deaths.append(deaths_df[deaths_df['Country/Region']=='France'][i].sum())
    germany_deaths.append(deaths_df[deaths_df['Country/Region']=='Germany'][i].sum())
    uk_deaths.append(deaths_df[deaths_df['Country/Region']=='United Kingdom'][i].sum())
    russia_deaths.append(deaths_df[deaths_df['Country/Region']=='Russia'][i].sum())
    brazil_deaths.append(deaths_df[deaths_df['Country/Region']=='Brazil'][i].sum())
    india_deaths.append(deaths_df[deaths_df['Country/Region']=='India'][i].sum())
    
    turkey_recoveries.append(recovered_df[recovered_df['Country/Region']=='Turkey'][i].sum())
    china_recoveries.append(recovered_df[recovered_df['Country/Region']=='China'][i].sum())
    italy_recoveries.append(recovered_df[recovered_df['Country/Region']=='Italy'][i].sum())
    us_recoveries.append(recovered_df[recovered_df['Country/Region']=='US'][i].sum())
    spain_recoveries.append(recovered_df[recovered_df['Country/Region']=='Spain'][i].sum())
    france_recoveries.append(recovered_df[recovered_df['Country/Region']=='France'][i].sum())
    germany_recoveries.append(recovered_df[recovered_df['Country/Region']=='Germany'][i].sum())
    uk_recoveries.append(recovered_df[recovered_df['Country/Region']=='United Kingdom'][i].sum())
    russia_recoveries.append(recovered_df[recovered_df['Country/Region']=='Russia'][i].sum())
    brazil_recoveries.append(recovered_df[recovered_df['Country/Region']=='Brazil'][i].sum())
    india_recoveries.append(recovered_df[recovered_df['Country/Region']=='India'][i].sum())

source.94b9cd1c:
def country_plot(days_since_1_22, country_cases, 
                 country_daily_increase, country_daily_death, 
                 country_daily_recovery, country):
    
    
    plt.figure(figsize = (7, 5))
    plt.plot(days_since_1_22, country_cases)
    plt.title("{}'nin vaka sayisi".format(country) ,size = 10)
    plt.xlabel("days_since_1_22", size = 10)
    plt.ylabel("vaka sayisi", size = 10)
    plt.xticks(size = 10)
    plt.yticks(size = 10)
    plt.show()
    
    plt.figure(figsize = (7, 5))
    plt.bar(days_since_1_22, country_daily_increase)
    plt.title("{}'nin Günlük vaka sayisi".format(country), size = 10)
    plt.xlabel("days_since_1_22", size = 10)
    plt.ylabel("Günlük vaka sayisi", size = 10)
    plt.xticks(size = 10)
    plt.yticks(size = 10)
    plt.show()
    
    plt.figure(figsize = (7, 5))
    plt.bar(days_since_1_22, country_daily_death)
    plt.title("{}'nin Günlük ölüm sayisi".format(country), size = 10)
    plt.xlabel("days_since_1_22", size = 10)
    plt.ylabel("Günlük ölüm sayisi", size = 10)
    plt.xticks(size = 10)
    plt.yticks(size = 10)
    plt.show()
    
    plt.figure(figsize = (7, 5))
    plt.bar(days_since_1_22, country_daily_recovery)
    plt.title("{}'nin Günlük kurtulma sayisi".format(country),size = 10)
    plt.xlabel("days_since_1_22", size = 10)
    plt.ylabel("Günlük kurtulma sayisi", size = 10)
    plt.xticks(size = 10)
    plt.yticks(size = 10)
    plt.show()
source.7d78e6e8: country_plot(days_since_1_22, us_cases, us_daily_increase, us_daily_death, us_daily_recovery, 'United States')
source.7a6695be:
#ülke karşılaştırma
plt.figure(figsize = (12,7))
plt.plot(days_since_1_22, china_cases)
plt.plot(days_since_1_22, turkey_cases)
plt.plot(days_since_1_22, italy_cases)
plt.plot(days_since_1_22, us_cases)
plt.plot(days_since_1_22, russia_cases)
plt.title("Ülkelerin vaka sayisi", size = 15)
plt.xlabel("days_since_1_22", size = 15)
plt.ylabel("vaka sayisi", size = 15)
plt.xticks(size = 15)
plt.yticks(size = 15)
plt.legend(["China", "Turkey", "Italy", "Usa", "Russian"], prop = {"size":15})
plt.show()

plt.figure(figsize=(12, 7))
plt.plot(days_since_1_22, china_deaths)
plt.plot(days_since_1_22, turkey_deaths)
plt.plot(days_since_1_22, italy_deaths)
plt.plot(days_since_1_22, us_deaths)
plt.plot(days_since_1_22, russia_deaths)

plt.title('Ülkelerin Ölüm Sayisi', size=15)
plt.xlabel('days_since_1_22', size=15)
plt.ylabel('Ölüm Sayisi', size=15)
plt.legend(["China", "Turkey", "Italy", "Usa", "Russian"], prop={'size': 15})
plt.xticks(size=15)
plt.yticks(size=15)
plt.show()

plt.figure(figsize=(12, 7))
plt.plot(days_since_1_22, china_recoveries)
plt.plot(days_since_1_22, turkey_recoveries)
plt.plot(days_since_1_22, italy_recoveries)
plt.plot(days_since_1_22, us_recoveries)
plt.plot(days_since_1_22, russia_recoveries)
plt.title('Ülkelerin Kurtulma Sayisi', size=15)
plt.xlabel('days_since_1_22', size=15)
plt.ylabel('Kurtulma Sayisi', size=15)
plt.legend(["China", "Turkey", "Italy", "Usa", "Russian"], prop={'size': 15})
plt.xticks(size=15)
plt.yticks(size=15)
plt.show()

source.467e65eb: * This study is a data analysis study conducted to inform about the situation of the rapidly spreading coronavirus in Turkey and in the world.
